definitions.definition: To educate or enlighten a person or people to a perceived higher standard of behaviour .
To introduce or impose the standards of one civilisation upon another civilization , group or person, arguably with the intent of achieving a perceived higher standard of behavior .
To bring from a state of savagery to an educated or refined state.

main_definition: To educate or enlighten a person or people to a perceived higher standard of behaviour .
secondary_definitions: To introduce or impose the standards of one civilisation upon another civilization , group or person, arguably with the intent of achieving a perceived higher standard of behavior .
To bring from a state of savagery to an educated or refined state.
